name: Aptonoth
description: Docile herbivores that graze in packs. Their meat is considered a delicacy and is rich in nutrients. If one member of the herd is attacked, the rest will flee immediately.

item.name: Raw Meat
item.description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

name: Jagras
description: Members of the Great Jagras pack, these smaller monsters will flee upon seeing one of their own perish. They're also known for ambushing larger monsters at a moment's notice.

name: Mernos
description: Wingdrakes that feast on scatternuts. The flock will travel great distances when startled, making them an invaluable mode of transportation for clever hunters.

name: Vespoid
description: Insects that paralyze their targets with their long stingers. They break easily, so attack them with poison or slinger ammo if you want to carve them.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

name: Mosswine
description: Mosswine are known for their excellent sense of smell, and are often found foraging for fungi. If you're hunting for mushrooms, follow the Mosswine to the motherlode.

name: Apceros
description: Herbivores that inhabit the Wildspire Waste. They've developed particularly hard hide to ward off attackers, and are known to gather in groups to defend themselves.

item.name: Raw Meat
item.description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

name: Kestodon
description: Female Kestodon will alert the pack of danger, while the males will violently charge would-be threats. Their rushing charges can be blocked, however, leaving them open to attacks.

name: Noios
description: Wingdrakes that produce a sound similar to screamer pods when startled. Use meat to get their attention, and then hunt them for materials, or use them for transportation.

name: Gajau
description: Vicious piscine that form groups to defend their territory from intruders. Be sure not to venture too closely to their habitat!

name: Kelbi
description: Small herbivores known for their gentle demeanor and the medicinal properties of their horns. Those wishing to harvest a horn should aim for the head when attacking them.

name: Raphinos
description: Wingdrakes inhabiting the Coral Highlands. They group up to steal the eggs of other animals, but this in turn exposes them to the attention of larger, more vicious predators.

name: Shamos
description: Small nocturnal monsters. They're particularly vulnerable to Tzitzi-Ya-Ku's blinding flash, but have been known to gang up on enemies.

name: Girros
description: Monsters known to attack in packs, using the deadly vapor of the Rotten Vale to their advantage. They're known for crippling targets with paralyzing fangs.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

name: Hornetaur
description: Small insects that are found primarily on land. They're highly territorial and will attack anything that approaches them. Gather their materials by attacking them with the slinger.

name: Gastodon
description: Pack monsters that inhabit the Elder's Recess. They are easily angered by intruders, and will charge at monsters twice their size.

name: Barnos
description: Fervid wingdrakes that have flourished under harsh living conditions. They target intruders with a unique acidic agent, and then attack as a swarm.

ailments.name: Defense Down
ailments.description: Some monsters may inflict a status that lowers a hunter's defense. Lasts for a certain period of time but can also be cured with defense-increasing items.

items.name: Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

items.name: Mega Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

item.name: Nulberry
item.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

item.name: Raw Meat
item.description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

item.name: Sturdy Bone
item.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Coral Highlands and Rotten Vale.

item.name: Monster Bone S
item.description: A material found in bonepiles. Indispensable for both hunting and daily life.

item.name: Wingdrake Hide
item.description: A material carved from wingdrakes. Lightweight and often used when crafting armor.

item.name: Barnos Hide+
item.description: Rare Barnos material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

item.name: Barnos Talon
item.description: Rare Barnos material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

name: Great Jagras
description: The pack leader of the Jagras. When hungry, Great Jagras are known to attack monsters even stronger than themselves. It balloons to unbelievable proportions after swallowing prey.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku
description: An odd bird wyvern that has developed limbs capable of carrying weapons. It's been spotted stealing eggs from nests found in the Ancient Forest and Wildspire Waste.

name: Pukei-Pukei
description: A bird wyvern known to possess poisonous toxins in its body. It's been spotted storing scatternuts in its mouth or tail, coating them with poison and spitting them out at threats.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

name: Barroth
description: Barroth seek out ants, their favorite snack, and mark their territory with mud. They attack potential rivals with their devastating charging attack.

ailments.name: Waterblight
ailments.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Muddy
ailments.description: A status effect inflicted when mud thrown by a monster covers the Hunter and makes movement more difficult. Slows all actions until the hunter leaves the mud.

item.name: Monster Bone M
item.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Strong yet flexible, it's as reliable as steel or wood.

item.name: Monster Keenbone
item.description: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor-sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

item.name: Wyvern Gem
item.description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

item.name: Barroth Shell
item.description: Barroth material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Barroth Ridge
item.description: Barroth material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Barroth Claw
item.description: Barroth material. Obtained by breaking its forelimbs. Hardy, used in many weapons.

item.name: Barroth Scalp
item.description: Barroth material. Obtained by breaking its head. Tough, used in many weapons.

item.name: Barroth Tail
item.description: Barroth material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

item.name: Fertile Mud
item.description: Barroth material. Obtained by breaking its mud covering. Unusual, used in select gear.

item.name: Barroth Carapace
item.description: Rare Barroth material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Barroth Ridge+
item.description: Rare Barroth material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Barroth Claw+
item.description: Rare Barroth material. Obtained by breaking its forelimbs. Hardy, used in many weapons.

item.name: Wyvern Tear
item.description: Bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Jyuratodus
description: A large piscine wyvern that inhabits the swamps of the Wildspire Waste. It uses mud to capture prey, and it's known to battle Barroth over territory.

ailments.name: Waterblight
ailments.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Muddy
ailments.description: A status effect inflicted when mud thrown by a monster covers the Hunter and makes movement more difficult. Slows all actions until the hunter leaves the mud.

name: Tobi-Kadachi
description: A fanged wyvern that flies among the trees of the Ancient Forest. Its penchant to brush against the ground and the trees as it moves around builds up static electricity within its fur.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Anjanath
description: The Anjanath patrols the Ancient Forest, looking for its favorite meal, Aptonoth. This belligerent monster will attack anything without hesitation.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

item.name: Monster Bone L
item.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to work with due to its size, but vital when crafting larger items.

item.name: Monster Keenbone
item.description: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor-sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

item.name: Flame Sac
item.description: A monster organ filled with flammable powder. Handle with extreme care.

item.name: Inferno Sac
item.description: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

item.name: Anjanath Scale
item.description: Anjanath material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Anjanath Pelt
item.description: Anjanath material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Highly heat-resistant, used to craft gear.

item.name: Anjanath Fang
item.description: Anjanath material. Obtained by breaking its head. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Anjanath Nosebone
item.description: Anjanath material. Obtained by breaking its head. Unusual and difficult to handle.

item.name: Anjanath Tail
item.description: Anjanath material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

item.name: Anjanath Plate
item.description: Anjanath material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Anjanath Scale+
item.description: Rare Anjanath material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Anjanath Pelt+
item.description: Rare Anjanath material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Highly heat-resistant, used to craft gear.

item.name: Anjanath Fang+
item.description: Rare Anjanath material. Obtained by breaking its head. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Anjanath Nosebone+
item.description: Rare Anjanath material. Obtained by breaking its head. Unusual and difficult to handle.

item.name: Anjanath Gem
item.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Anjanath tissue. Used to dramatically improve gear.

item.name: Wyvern Tear
item.description: Bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Azure Rathalos
description: An azure-colored subspecies of Rathalos. More mobile than their standard cousins, they locate prey from the air and quickly swoop in for the kill.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

item.name: Monster Hardbone
item.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

item.name: Inferno Sac
item.description: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

item.name: Rath Wingtalon
item.description: Material from Rathian and Rathalos. Obtained by breaking its wings. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Rathalos Plate
item.description: Rathalos material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Rathalos Medulla
item.description: Rare Rathalos material. Obtained by carving. Grants fire element properties.

item.name: Rathalos Ruby
item.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Rathalos tissue. Almost too nice to use.

item.name: Azure Rathalos Scale+
item.description: Rare Azure Rathalos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Azure Rathalos Carapace
item.description: Rare Azure Rathalos material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Azure Rathalos Tail
item.description: Rare Azure Rathalos material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Compatible with fire element.

item.name: Azure Rathalos Wing
item.description: Rare Azure Rathalos material. Obtained by breaking its wings. Supple, used to craft gear.

item.name: Large Wyvern Tear
item.description: Large, bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Bazelgeuse
description: A nefarious flying wyvern that travels the New World in search of prey. It scatters explosive scales over a wide area to prey on whatever gets caught in the blast.

ailments.name: Blastblight
ailments.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

item.name: Monster Hardbone
item.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Scale+
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Carapace
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Tail
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Fuse
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Obtained by breaking its head. Grants blast element properties.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Talon
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Mostly obtained by carving. Compatible with blast element.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Wing
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Obtained by breaking its wings. Hard, used in many weapons.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Gem
item.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Bazelgeuse tissue. Used to dramatically improve gear.

item.name: Large Wyvern Tear
item.description: Large, bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Behemoth
description: A powerful beast from another world. Its large horns and muscular frame defy nature. Unique strategies are required to battle it.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

items.name: Astera Jerky
items.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Deviljho
description: A monster that must feed constantly and will devour anything in its path, even feeding on the largest of monsters with its massive jowls.

ailments.name: Dragonblight
ailments.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Defense Down
ailments.description: Some monsters may inflict a status that lowers a hunter's defense. Lasts for a certain period of time but can also be cured with defense-increasing items.

items.name: Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

items.name: Mega Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

name: Diablos
description:
The apex monster of the Wildspire Waste.
A menacing, territorial beast that lurks underground.
Loud noises will cause it to lunge out of the sand in search of prey.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

item.name: Dash Extract
item.description: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

item.name: Monster Bone+
item.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to obtain, but vital for crafting powerful equipment.

item.name: Monster Hardbone
item.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

item.name: Wyvern Gem
item.description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

item.name: Diablos Shell
item.description: Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Diablos Ridge
item.description: Diablos material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Diablos Tailcase
item.description: Diablos material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Sturdy, but difficult to handle.

item.name: Diablos Fang
item.description: Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Twisted Horn
item.description: Diablos material. Obtained by breaking its horns. Stout, used in many weapons.

item.name: Diablos Marrow
item.description: Diablos material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Diablos Carapace
item.description: Rare Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Diablos Ridge+
item.description: Rare Diablos material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Majestic Horn
item.description: Rare Diablos material. Obtained by breaking its horns. Stout, used in many weapons.

item.name: Wyvern Tear
item.description: Bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Black Diablos
description: These black-shelled Diablos are actually female Diablos in heat. The color signals their aggressiveness and heightened hostility to other creatures in their habitat.

item.name: Dash Extract
item.description: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

item.name: Monster Hardbone
item.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

item.name: Wyvern Gem
item.description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

item.name: Diablos Tailcase
item.description: Diablos material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Sturdy, but difficult to handle.

item.name: Diablos Fang
item.description: Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Twisted Horn
item.description: Diablos material. Obtained by breaking its horns. Stout, used in many weapons.

item.name: Diablos Marrow
item.description: Diablos material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Blos Medulla
item.description: Rare Diablos material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Black Diablos Carapace
item.description: Rare Black Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Black Diablos Ridge+
item.description: Rare Black Diablos material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Black Spiral Horn+
item.description: Rare Black Diablos material. Obtained by breaking its horns. Stout, used in many weapons.

item.name: Large Wyvern Tear
item.description: Large, bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Dodogama
description: A monster that devours rock as its primary diet. The Crystals it devours mix with its saliva to produce explosive minerals that it can spit at its enemies.

ailments.name: Blastblight
ailments.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

item.name: Nourishing Extract
item.description: Can be obtained from certain large monsters. Has the ability to amplify the effects of certain medicines.

item.name: Monster Keenbone
item.description: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor-sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

item.name: Dodogama Scale+
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Dodogama Hide+
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Supple, used to craft gear.

item.name: Dodogama Jaw
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Obtained by breaking its head. Unusual and difficult to handle.

item.name: Dodogama Talon
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Obtained by breaking its forelegs. Heavy, used to craft armor.

item.name: Dodogama Tail
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Tough, used in many weapons.

name: Great Girros
description:
A monster that scavenges for meals dropped from the Coral Highlands.
It acts as the alpha leader of a Girros pack, and sports giant fangs that paralyze its prey.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

name: Kirin
description:
Kirin are so rarely sighted that little is known of their ecology. It's been said they envelop themselves in pure electricity when they are provoked.
The lightning a Kirin cloaks itself with has been confirmed to toughen its skin. The key to hunting a Kirin lies in staggering it, using Elderseal weapons, and protecting yourself from and avoiding its lightning attacks.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

item.name: Lightcrystal
item.description: A precious and extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for crafting tools.

item.name: Novacrystal
item.description: High quality Lightcrystal. Highly coveted for its rarity, it's used for only the finest of metalworking.

item.name: Elder Dragon Bone
item.description: A bone from an elder dragon. It exudes the great majesty of the beast that bore it.

item.name: Elder Dragon Blood
item.description: Contains an unknown compound. The object of much scholarly research.

item.name: Kirin Hide
item.description: Kirin material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Kirin Tail
item.description: Kirin material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Compatible with thunder element.

item.name: Kirin Mane
item.description: Kirin material. Mostly obtained by carving. Highly thunder-resistant, used to craft gear.

item.name: Kirin Thunderhorn
item.description: Kirin material. Obtain by breaking its horn. Grants thunder element properties.

item.name: Kirin Hide+
item.description: Rare Kirin material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Kirin Thundertail
item.description: Rare Kirin material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Compatible with thunder element.

item.name: Kirin Azure Horn
item.description: Rare Kirin material. Obtain by breaking its horn. Grants thunder element properties.

item.name: Dragon Treasure
item.description: A shiny rock that elder dragons like to collect. (Account Item)

name: Kulve Taroth
description: An Elder Dragon that protects itself with a glittering coat of metal. Its ecology and coat differ with each appearance, thus the need for a thorough investigation. An exhaustive investigation is required in order to break Kulve Taroth's giant gold plated horns. Pursue the monster to learn more about it. Gather tracks and recruit hunters to help you further your investigation.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Kushala Daora
description: An elder dragon that shields itself with fierce winds, preventing anyone from approaching it. Its skin consists of hard, metallic scales.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

name: Lavasioth
description: Lavasioth utilizes molten lava as armor. They are extremely aggressive and will attack without prejudice until the threat has been eliminated.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Legiana
description: The apex monster of the Coral Highlands, whose diet primarily consists of Raphinos. It emits a chilling wind from its body, which dulls its prey's ability to escape.

ailments.name: Iceblight
ailments.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Lunastra
description: A rare female Elder Dragon that litters the air with hot blue dust. Reports of it traveling with her mate, Teostra, are still unconfirmed.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Nergigante
description: A terrible elder dragon that appears when other elders are in the vicinity. Its penchant for destruction is well documented.

name: Odogaron
description: A terrifying monster that scours the Rotten Vale for carrion. Its highly aggressive nature means that anything, be it monster or man, is a potential meal.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

items.name: Astera Jerky
items.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

name: Paolumu
description: Paolumu feast on eggs found in the Coral Highlands. They are able to propel through the air using unique sacs in their bodies, and attack with their extremely hard tails.

ailments.name: Wind Pressure
ailments.description: Wind pressure causes the hunter to brace against powerful winds, causing temporarily imobility.

name: Radobaan
description: A gigantic brute wyvern that eats the bones of carcasses found in the Rotten Vale, using some of it as armor. It also rolls into a ball as a form of attack and transportation.

ailments.name: Sleep
ailments.description: Sleep renders the hunter or monster inactive and susceptible to increased damage, but only for the first hit, as it will then wake them up.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

name: Rathalos
description: The apex monster of the Ancient Forest, also known as the "King of the Skies". A fierce wyvern that descends upon invaders, attacking with its venomous claws and fiery breath.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

name: Rathian
description: A wyvern known as the "Queen of the Land." Terrestrial predator, it overpowers its prey with a venomous tail and powerful legs.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

name: Pink Rathian
description: A subspecies with vibrant pink scales. Pink Rathians wield their toxic tails more deftly than normal Rathians, weakening prey with poison before moving in for the kill.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

name: Teostra
description: A brutal elder dragon wreathed in flames that spits blazing fire. Teostra are of such a fierce and deadly nature that the Guild closely monitors their movements.

ailments.name: Blastblight
ailments.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku
description: This odd monster blinds both prey and enemies with a special pulsing organ near its head. It then uses its strong legs to deliver finishing blows.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

name: Uragaan
description: Large Brute Wyverns that feed on ore, using their mighty jaws to crush solid rock to powder. They've been known to confront Lavasioths over territory disputes.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Sleep
ailments.description: Sleep renders the hunter or monster inactive and susceptible to increased damage, but only for the first hit, as it will then wake them up.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

name: Vaal Hazak
description: A grotesque Elder Dragon, that inhabits the deepest part of the Rotten Vale. It uses the fatal vapor of the vale in what appears to be a symbiotic relationship.

ailments.name: Effluvial Buildup
ailments.description: Effluvial buildup causes damage over time, and eventually cuts your maximum health in half if ignored for too long.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

skills.name: Effluvial Expert
skills.description: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

skills.name: Effluvia Resistance
skills.description: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.

name: Xeno'jiiva
description: RESEARCHING. Threat level unknown.

ailments.name: Dragonblight
ailments.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Zorah Magdaros
description: An elder dragon that rises from the earth like a volcano. Where it's headed, and why, the Research Commission has yet to figure out.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Leshen
description: Dwelling deep inside the forest, these creatures use their innate magic to control all flora and fauna within their territory.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

items.name: Astera Jerky
items.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

name: Ancient Leshen
description: An old leshen that arrived through a portal to assume control over the Ancient Forest. Sometimes revered as an indigenous deity.

ailments.name: Bleeding

name: Safi'jiiva
description: The fully-grown form of Xeno'jiiva. It absorbs energy from its environment to heal itself and change the ecosystem.

name: Stygian Zinogre
description: Has a symbiotic relationship with Dracophage Bugs, which it releases like bullets. Becomes even more dangerous when covered in light.

ailments.name: Dragonblight

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Rajang
description: An ultra-aggressive creature that few have a chance of surviving against. Sports powerful arms that pack a punch, and turns gold when angry.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

name: Viper Tobi-Kadachi
description: The tail of this subspecies secretes a toxin while its fangs paralyze prey. It can also glide without climbing trees.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

ailments.name: Poison

name: Namielle
description: An Elder Dragon said to be able to command water and use it as a shield. Though very few sightings have ever been reported, they mention 'exploding water' and 'bright glowing lights.' Its existence remains shrouded in mystery.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

name: Acidic Glavenus
description: A new subspecies to the ferocious Glavenus, the Acidic Glavenus features a sulphur covered tail. Found only in the rotting areas of the New World, a corrosive fluid has crystallized on its tail, spraying acid with each swing that can apply a debuff to those that get caught in it.

ailments.name: Defense Down
ailments.description: Some monsters may inflict a status that lowers a hunter's defense. Lasts for a certain period of time but can also be cured with defense-increasing items.

items.name: Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

items.name: Mega Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

name: Ruiner Nergigante
description: Countless battles have only hardened this Nergigante variant. In addition to healing, its spikes grow tougher as it loses health.
